mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user(user_id, power, user_name, pass_word, nick_name, phone, gender, create_time, last_edit_time) VALUE (#{userId}, #{power}, #{userName}, #{passWord}, #{nickName}, #{phone}, #{gender}, #{createTime}, #{lastEditTime})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, power, user_name, pass_word, nick_name, phone, gender, create_time, last_edit_time FROM tb_user WHERE user_name = #{userName}
SELECT user_id, power, user_name, pass_word, nick_name, phone, gender, create_time, last_edit_time FROM tb_user WHERE user_name = #{userName} AND pass_word = #{passWord}
